title: Emotions Wheel Exercises
introText: Take your time with these calming exercises to build emotional awareness and expand your ability to identify and name feelings with kindness toward yourself.

exercises.title: Name Your Emotion
exercises.description: A 4-step guided process to help you identify and understand your emotions by connecting body sensations, thoughts, and urges to the right emotion name.

exercises.title: Emotion Tracker
exercises.description: Track your daily primary and secondary emotions using the Emotions Wheel, and view patterns over time to build emotional awareness.

exercises.title: Practice With Others
exercises.description: Observe and record others' emotions to build empathy and validation skills. Practice identifying what you see and asking about their emotional experience.

reminder.title: Be Patient With Yourself
reminder.content: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion.
